name: Squish - OTA Compressor Pedal
details:
Compressor PedalSQUISH is a gentle compressor with low distortion that doesn't affect tone. Using a feed-forward architecture, it responds to dynamic volume changes in a subtle fashion, unlike the industry-standard (Ross) feedback type. The OTA circuit provides fast response without compromising signal quality, maintaining dynamics, and providing a much more natural presentation. Optimally dialed in for humbuckers. Great on bass!
Specifications
True bypass
16dB gain
180k ohm input impedance
0.2% distortion
20 to 8kHz bandwidth
3V output capability
9V to 12V @ 12mA power
https://www.hagamps.com/collections/silicon/products/squish-ota-compressor-pedal
